bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Hiram Haines (1802-?) was son of Ezekial and Mary Miller Haines of Delamore Forest, Culpepper Co., Virginia. He travelled and worked for different Virginia and North Carolina newspapers during the 1820s and 1830s. He married Mary Ann Currie Philpotts in September 1826. After heavy financial losses, he moved with his brother William Haines to a farm in Culpepper County, Virginia, in 1838.
